verses.verse: מִזְמ֡וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm שִׁ֤ירוּ <S%H7891><s%> O sing לַֽיהוָ֨ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD שִׁ֣יר <S%H7892><s%> song חָ֭דָשׁ <S%H2319><s%> a new כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נִפְלָא֣וֹת <S%H6381><s%> marvellous things עָשָׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> for he hath done הוֹשִֽׁיעָה־ <S%H3467><s%> hath gotten him the victory לּ֥וֹ יְ֝מִינ֗וֹ <S%H3225><s%> his right hand וּזְר֥וֹעַ <S%H2220><s%> arm קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H6944><s%> and his holy

הוֹדִ֣יעַ <S%H3045><s%> hath made known יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD יְשׁוּעָת֑וֹ <S%H3444><s%> his salvation לְעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight הַ֝גּוֹיִ֗ם <S%H1471><s%> of the heathen גִּלָּ֥ה <S%H1540><s%> hath he openly shewed צִדְקָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H6666><s%> his righteousness

זָ֘כַ֤ר <S%H2142><s%> He hath remembered חַסְדּ֨וֹ ׀ <S%H2617><s%> his mercy וֶֽאֱֽמוּנָתוֹ֮ <S%H530><s%> and his truth לְבֵ֪ית <S%H1004><s%> toward the house יִשְׂרָ֫אֵ֥ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel רָא֥וּ <S%H7200><s%> have seen כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> All אַפְסֵי־ <S%H657><s%> all the ends אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth אֵ֝֗ת <S%H853><s%> יְשׁוּעַ֥ת <S%H3444><s%> the salvation אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> of our God

הָרִ֣יעוּ <S%H7321><s%> Make a joyful noise לַֽ֭יהוָה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> all the earth פִּצְח֖וּ <S%H6476><s%> make a loud noise וְרַנְּנ֣וּ <S%H7442><s%> and rejoice וְזַמֵּֽרוּ׃ <S%H2167><s%> and sing

זַמְּר֣וּ <S%H2167><s%> Sing לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD בְּכִנּ֑וֹר <S%H3658><s%> with the harp בְּ֝כִנּ֗וֹר <S%H3658><s%> with the harp וְק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> and the voice זִמְרָֽה׃ <S%H2172><s%> of a psalm

בַּ֭חֲצֹ֣צְרוֹת <S%H2689><s%> With trumpets וְק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> and sound שׁוֹפָ֑ר <S%H7782><s%> of cornet הָ֝רִ֗יעוּ <S%H7321><s%> make a joyful noise לִפְנֵ֤י ׀ <S%H6440><s%> before הַמֶּ֬לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the King יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD
יִרְעַ֣ם <S%H7481><s%> roar הַ֭יָּם <S%H3220><s%> Let the sea וּמְלֹא֑וֹ <S%H4393><s%> and the fulness תֵּ֝בֵ֗ל <S%H8398><s%> thereof the world וְיֹ֣שְׁבֵי <S%H3427><s%> and they that dwell בָֽהּ׃

נְהָר֥וֹת <S%H5104><s%> Let the floods יִמְחֲאוּ־ <S%H4222><s%> clap כָ֑ף <S%H3709><s%> [their] hands יַ֝֗חַד <S%H3162><s%> together הָרִ֥ים <S%H2022><s%> let the hills יְרַנֵּֽנוּ׃ <S%H7442><s%> be joyful

לִֽפְֽנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> Before יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for בָא֮ <S%H935><s%> for he cometh לִשְׁפֹּ֪ט <S%H8199><s%> to judge הָ֫אָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth יִשְׁפֹּֽט־ <S%H8199><s%> shall he judge תֵּבֵ֥ל <S%H8398><s%> the world בְּצֶ֑דֶק <S%H6664><s%> with righteousness וְ֝עַמִּ֗ים <S%H5971><s%> and the people בְּמֵישָׁרִֽים׃ <S%H4339><s%> with equity
